title: Dmitry Medvedev
summary: Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev (/mɪdˈvɛdɪf/; Russian: Дмитрий Анатольевич Медведев, IPA: [ˈdmʲitrʲɪj ɐnɐˈtolʲjɪvʲɪtɕ mʲɪdˈvʲedʲɪf]; born 14 September 1965) is a Russian politician serving as Deputy Chairman of the Security Council of Russia since 2020.[2] Medvedev served as president from 2008 to 2012 and as prime minister from 2012 to 2020.[3]
